    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Analysis
    The Analysis class provides functionality to analyze a user's spending habits and budget usage.
    App
    The App.App class represents the home page for our application.
    AuthController
    AuthController manages user authentication, account creation, and session management.
    Budget
    The Budget class provides functionality to manage budgets in a database.
    budgetAnalysis
    The budgetAnalysis class provides functionality to manage and analyze budget data.
    Expense
    This class is responsible for managing user expenses including creating, displaying, updating, and deleting expense records in a database.
    IncomeController
    Manages income records for a user, including adding, editing, and deleting income entries in a database.
    LoginUI
    The LoginUI class manages the user interface for login and sign-up flow.
    ReminderController
    Manages reminders for a user, including creating, editing, and deleting reminders in a database.
    User
    The User class represents a user with basic information such as username, email, mobile phone number, and password.
